attributes.action: Stop any plans to change the UK Voting System, I say No to any Voting Reform Plans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the Prime Minister to stop "fiddling the books" and get back to his job of being the Prime Minister!  The Country in in a mess, so get your Government back to what it should be doing and sort it out, Tories as well!  You all may feel to be part of an "elite" group, well take it from me it has gone to your heads!!  Sort yourselves out, get your heads out of the sand, I could have said out of somewhere else.  This Country needs You NOW!  If you get chucked out later, it's your own doing, other people are losing their's Now!
